languages.text: Варп-твари подчинили своей воле команду одной из макропушек и устроили резню среди тех, кто воспротивился ереси. Вся надежда команды — на Лорд-капитана!
Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!
languages.original_text: Варп-твари подчинили своей воле команду одной из макропушек и устроили резню среди тех, кто воспротивился ереси. Вся надежда команды — на Лорд-капитана!

traits.locale_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is the crew's only hope!
Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is the crew's only hope!
Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!
Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!
Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!

languages.text: 亚空间野兽蛊惑了一名宏炮操作员，杀害了那些勇于反抗异端的人。如今，舰长大人是他们唯一的希望！
languages.original_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!

traits.locale_text: 亚空间野兽蛊惑了一名宏炮操作员，杀害了那些勇于反抗异端的人。如今，舰长大人是他们唯一的希望！

languages.text: Las bestias de la disformidad han embrujado a la tripulación a cargo de uno de los macrocañones y han masacrado a los que se resistían a la herejía. ¡{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán es su única esperanza!
languages.original_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!

traits.locale_text: Las bestias de la disformidad han embrujado a la tripulación a cargo de uno de los macrocañones y han masacrado a los que se resistían a la herejía. ¡{mf|El|La} Lord Capitán es su única esperanza!

languages.text: <歪み>の獣が、あるマクロキャノンを担当するクルーを魅了して、異端に染まらなかった者達を惨殺した。ロード・キャプテンこそ彼らの唯一の希望だ！
languages.original_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!

traits.locale_text: <歪み>の獣が、あるマクロキャノンを担当するクルーを魅了して、異端に染まらなかった者達を惨殺した。ロード・キャプテンこそ彼らの唯一の希望だ！

languages.text: L'équipe affectée à l'un des macro-canons est désormais soumise à la volonté des créatures du Warp et massacre tous ceux qui tentent de résister à cette hérésie. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est leur seul espoir !
languages.original_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!

traits.locale_text: L'équipe affectée à l'un des macro-canons est désormais soumise à la volonté des créatures du Warp et massacre tous ceux qui tentent de résister à cette hérésie. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} est leur seul espoir !

languages.text: Warpmonster haben die Crew einer der Makrokanonen verzaubert und alle massakriert, die sich der Ketzerei widersetzt haben. Der Lord Captain ist ihre einzige Hoffnung!
languages.original_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!

traits.locale_text: Warpmonster haben die Crew einer der Makrokanonen verzaubert und alle massakriert, die sich der Ketzerei widersetzt haben. Der Lord Captain ist ihre einzige Hoffnung!

languages.text: Öteboyut yaratıkları, bir makro toptan sorumlu mürettebatı büyüleyerek kâfirliğe sürükledi ve direnenleri katletti. Lord Kaptan, onların tek umudu!
languages.original_text: Warp beasts have enthralled the crew in charge of one of the macro-cannons and massacred those who resisted the heresy. The Lord Captain is their only hope!
